message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.HC. 

The paper deals with natural language processing (NLP) and conversational agents, which are typically covered under the Computer Science sub-category of Computation and Language (cs.CL). The use of language models such as BERT and GPT-2 falls under the sub-category of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The experiments and tests conducted in the paper involve machine learning and statistical analysis, which are covered under the sub-category of Machine Learning (cs.LG). The paper also deals with information retrieval and search, which falls under the sub-category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the paper introduces an application for HR support, which involves human-computer interaction and user interfaces, and is covered under the sub-category of Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC).
